entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 11:28 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure: 98.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
